article_title: Democrats tie vulnerable GOP senators to Trump
article_text:
Weatherford, TX (76086)

Today

Thunderstorms during the morning hours, then skies turning partly cloudy during the afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High around 90F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: Kery Murakami CNHI Washington Reporter

og.description: WASHINGTON - Now that Donald Trump is GOP’s presumed nominee for president, Republicans senators in tough reelection races are in the spot of having to voice support for the party’s
